alldb.table_sql: select * from ( select i.ID, cust.CUST_NAME custname, info.CONTRACT_NUMBER contractnumber, info.id contractid, info.PROJECT_NAME projectname, info.create_date contractdate, p.proj_id projid, d.NAME_ deptname, cust2.CUST_NAME custdealer, i.TAXNUMBER taxnumber, i.INVOICENUMBER , i.INVOICE_ADDRESS invoiceaddress, i.INVOICE_TEL invoicetel, i.INVOICE_OPENBANK invoiceopenbank, i.INVOICE_MEMO, i.INVOICE_REMARKS, case when i.INVOICE_TYPE = 'invoicetype1' then '增值税专用发票' when i.INVOICE_TYPE = 'invoicetype2' then '增值税普通发票' else '' end invoicetypename, i.INVOICE_TYPE invoicetype, i.MODIFY_DATE modifydate from CONTRACT_INVOICE_INFO i left join contract_info info on info.id = i.CONTRACT_ID left join proj_info p on p.id = info.proj_id left join cust_info cust on cust.ID=info.CUST_ID left join cust_info_dealer del on del.CUST_ID = info.CUST_DEALER left join cust_info cust2 on cust2.ID = del.CUST_ID left join t_depts d on d.ID_ = info.PROJ_DEPT where i.CONTRACT_ID is not null and info.PROJECT_NAME not like 'P%' )rs where 1=1 /~projectname: and projectname like '%{projectname}%' ~/ /~contractnumber: and contractnumber like '%{contractnumber}%' ~/ /~custdealer: and custdealer like '%{custdealer}%' ~/ /~custname: and custname like '%{custname}%' ~/ /~modifydate_start: and modifydate >= '{modifydate_start}' ~/ /~modifydate_end: and modifydate <= '{modifydate_end}' ~/ /~invoicetypename: and invoicetypename like '%{invoicetypename}%' ~/
